title: Smartphone-Based Technology-Integrated Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Education program for improving real-life problem-solving skills in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can use smartphones to mathematically model real-world problems
Learners can share technology-integrated learning experiences through collaborative activities based on a Learning Management System (LMS)
Learners can visualize problem-solving processes using mobile-friendly tools (calculator apps, graphing tools, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
